column4: ok besides the ubuntu forums where else can I find good customization tips and tricks (i already did all the ones I liked on the forums)
Samba question :  http://www.pastebin.com/275430 - can someone tell me why the movies and television share will NOT let me access them?
dont get me started on samba...it hates people
well if you know what the problem is, a bit of advice would be nice :)
one day i woke up and my samba wont even load past the Microsoft Windows Network icon...i gave up on it ... after months of it working fine and nothing changed
